lines: While you are sitting quietly at a party, you notice a very pretty, very slim young woman in a short skirt bend over to pick up something she has dropped on the floor.
"Oh!" The young lady turns around and looks at you with a startled expression on her face. You can:
You don't exactly have to admit it. She shakes her finger at you and tells you to behave yourself.
After all these years of untrustworthy behavior, do you think she is going to fall for that innocent look? No way! She shakes her finger at you and tells you to behave yourself.
Because you have been fairly trustworthy, the young lady gets suspicious, but can hardly believe a nice old gent like you could have done such a nasty thing. You have gotten away with it.
"OUCH!" That hurt. The young lady turns around startled and looks you right in the eye. She is mad! You can:
#TELL HER YOU WILL KISS IT AND MAKE IT BETTER
Apology accepted. "Don't let it happen again!"
"The nerve!" For the rest of the party every woman under fifty protects her bottom when she walks by.
It's difficult to resist such temptations, isn't it? The sight of her firm, round, bottom brings back such sweet memories. Would you like to change your mind and give her a little pinch?
